website_summaries.verdict: If this digital endoscope seems a bit pricey, note that it includes features that most of its competitors don’t, including 360° image rotation, a memory card slot, and simple app-free usage.
cons: Its 5-meter cable would be fine if there weren’t cheaper models that had double the cord length

customer_reviews.title: Aweful picture quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just plain aweful picture quality. Customer service is just as bad. I inquired about the picture quality, maybe something is wrong. They didn't even ask me about it. Just said there nothing wrong picture quality. That I was using it wrong. 20 + years as a maintenance tech and to just say I was using it wrong. Take my word, save your money. Buy something else but not this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Refund.
customer_reviews.text: Start to appear "camera disconnect" error on the screen and lose pictures. Check the connection. Everything looks good. Put it on the table. Without moving, the picture will go in and out and disconnect the camera. Refund.
customer_reviews.author: Aferdo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super fast. Endoscope was packaged nicely. Used mine to inspect carbon build up on intake valves. I was able to see the valves perfectly. Screen resolution is great. Led's are super bright and provide good lighting in the darkest of places. Well worth the $. 1 dislike was the need for a special memory card. The memory cards I had laying around would not work and it does not come with one. Which is another draw back...for the price it should include memory card. You don't need to the memory card to use this scope, only to save pictures. Overall I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase and would def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made endoscope
customer_reviews.text: This unit came fully charged. You simply plug the scope into the included monitor, and press the power button. Unit focuses well and has good color rendition, The size of the monitor makes it convenient to pack with your tools. The camera led provides plenty of light. I used the scope to check my drain line, and saw lots of debris. Image quality and resolution was good.
customer_reviews.author: tedsto

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This little handy tool was great to see where i can’t. This is a high tech product in a small, easy to use, package! The monitor display it very clear and easy to use. It was a very cool experience using this thing. Decent battery life. I always wanted to buy something like this for myself but they are pricey until I tried this one. I will highly recommend to purchase this great endoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great Industrial Endoscope, Rotek LCD camera is an excellent buy for the money and a excellent product too. This is a well thought out camera product with great accessories. The clarity of the pictures a good enough to make out what you are looking at and come with Long line. It has more than enough line for me to work with. Excellent sell with an excellent price and camera, so you can't go wrong.Try it you too will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to assist with running wire and drilling inside of drywall. Fully charged device once received. Easy to use but video feed kept randomly freezing. This progressed to intermittent black screen (backlight but no picture). When pressing camera button error message would be displayed (see photo). I could occasionally get it working again by either resetting device via reset button or reinserting the battery. Eventually, both the camera and the LED failed. Returning item for refund and will try my luck with another make and model.
customer_reviews.author: W. S. Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting such good quality for the price but this endoscope is very impressive. The build quality is very durable. The quality of the video is quite good. The LED lighting at the end of the camera is nice and bright. Does what I need it to do in finding out why a drain is clogged or to get into a tight spot and see what's going on. I can see me using this when working on my truck. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a Handy Device for Home and Auto
customer_reviews.text: Bought for inspecting muffler systems for blockages and various things around the house. Previously, I had purchased the wifi endoscope that connects to your phone, and these were a great pain to use. This is a definite upgrade to those old devices. Out of the box, the product was ready to go. Easy turn on and functionality. For what I need to do, I think the image quality is great, especially for the price. I may end up buying another with a longer cord to do long pipeline inspections.
customer_reviews.author: The Nations

customer_reviews.title: Videos recorded can not leave the device, uses unknown format on TF card.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the videos only work on the device itself, while they are saved on the TF card, it is in a format that no PC will read. Utterly useless for what I bought it for - if anyone is looking to take video with this and then save it on their computer, you are out of luck I'm afraid. Otherwise, works like it should.. menu is a big clunky however.
customer_reviews.author: TXTA

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Quality looking packaging and quality made instrument. Came fully charged and with memory card inserted. Easy to operate and instructions are clear, which is good as I am a bit technically challenged. The 16 foot wand is stiff and a little difficult to maneuver but gets easier with practice.. The screen view and pictures taken are clear. Purchased it to look for vermin (voles) in those out of the way places on the property. So far have found several areas where the are nesting. Makes trap placement easier.
customer_reviews.author: Grampa Al

customer_reviews.title: Great for around the house or the pro
customer_reviews.text: I bough this to help me do some wireing in my house. I was a little skeptical of the quality for the price but it has been great. You can adjust the brightness on the light at the end. This was very helpful, it also has a light built in to the handheld unit that came in handy a few times. The resolution is great. Its not crystal clear but it is good enough to read a label printed on the side of wire. I would definitely recommend this to any if my friends. It is very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Colin & Jay

customer_reviews.title: If you think you need this, you definitely need it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really handy. The picture is actually 1080. Very happy with the picture quality. The camera itself takes some getting used to with aiming it and getting your sight right but you pick it up quickly. I’m very happy I bought this thing. Very nice to have in the garage or the house. Even has a flash light on the housing, plus one for the camera. Both of them can be turned on and off.
customer_reviews.author: turboguy327

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: With this small device, the job becomes way much easier for me. The wire is flexible enough that you can look behind things. This endoscope comes with a large screen which is quite convenient compared with some other ones requiring a smartphone to view the image. Super easy to set up and use. I really love this product. And it’s has an unbeatable price for the quality it has.
customer_reviews.author: CATHERINE

customer_reviews.title: Glides easily & waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for sewer, pipes, or for in between walls. Originally I needed to check if my drain pipe is clear of debris, and this worked perfectly. Its so easy to glide into pipes. A light is attached to the camera and you can watch everything live while working on the drain. The remote is very straight forward and easy to use. Oh, and it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Lance GYW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Good video quality here – especially made for dimly lit or dark areas. If using this in full sunlight, then you'll want to shade the tip part a bit. It's easy to use and simply plug and play – turn it on and it works. Solid build quality that is also very lightweight. Two thumbs up here.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: Clear video!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tool to help with mechanic work. I work on my own cars and this tool makes it extremely easy to look for bolts/parts in hard to reach areas! The video quality is great and I like that you can record to an SD card to view images/videos on other devices. Also comes with attachments tips to help you get in any spot!
customer_reviews.author: Jay23

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable endoscope!
customer_reviews.text: Good endoscope. Screen size is nice and very bright. Camera quality is good. The length of camera line is crazy. Out performs my old endoscope hands down. Added benefit of taking a snap shot of what your looking at. Controls take a little while to master. All and all worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my car. I am not a mechanic by any means, but will do the easier maintenance work on my car. I picked this up so I could look into the harder to see areas in my engine bay. Product exceeded my expectations and I am glad to have another tool in my toolbox now.
customer_reviews.author: Renee W.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it ! Great device! Retrieved a $10,000 engagement ring that dropped down into a wall!
customer_reviews.text: My friends 5 year old daughter, dropped her diamond engagement ring and it rolled under the radiator and since the floor was not finished to the wall, the ring dropped down and into the wall. The ring was thought to be lost for that 5 years. My friend was selling her house. So I got online , ordered this device and thought it was worth a try. Well I found the ring, sitting on a ledge about 6 inches down. Using the hook attachment , I was able to get the >$10,000 dollar engagement ring from the wall. This was well worth the investment. !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kayo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent endoscope for the money
customer_reviews.text: I got it mostly for plumbing and let me tell you that it definitely serves it's purpose. Worth every penny when my wife had her sink clogged and didn't know why, it is fit through the sink seal and I was able to see the bottom of it and all of the hair down there. Very slim and fits through almost every single plumbing pipe you can imagine . Very user friendly, the screen is visible and it has different light intensity modes.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Rotek endoscope
customer_reviews.text: This scope was bought because the service tech I work with could not get a shift plate with four shift forks to line up on a tractor.The clarity of this unit is great. All the parts inside of the transmission were easy to see. The adjustable light works great also. The cord with the camera has just the right amount of stiffness to adjust and hold the right angle that you need, Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: TEG

customer_reviews.title: Good, but mine has no way to work with attachments
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the most part. Used it to fish around in the car’s AC for some build up in HVAC system. Biggest gripe is that the camera is supposed to have threading around the top of the camera, as visible in the manual and pictures here on Amazon, for the hook, cap, and other attachments to screw on and it it lacking that (see my picture). Oh well, not an absolute deal breaker, but was disappointed to see mine did not have any way to work with those attachments. Just be aware if you order this!
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: That picture quality is a little fuzzy, but that is to be expected from such a small camera. It works great, and is super easy to use. Battery lasts a long time even on full brightness. Even comes with attachments for the end for different jobs
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Munro

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have !!!
customer_reviews.text: With this endoscopy any job that requires to look behind stuff or hard to reach areas become way easier. It has a large screen, which is very convenient to see without any delay as few other products have to be linked to your cell phones. Looking behind dry walls or difficult area to reach in attic is very easy now. In short my experience with this appliance as of now is great, really happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ali n Nida

customer_reviews.title: working perfect !
customer_reviews.text: recently purchased it try to fix air condition by my self , I think something stuck in somewhere I can't see and this thing is help me , I can clear see a piece of wood stuck in there and made a wired noise , I like fix things in my house , this machine is help my a lot for somewhere tiny spot I can't reach . I'm happy with this purchased .
customer_reviews.author: Eric Y Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little tool to look in small dark locations
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, came pre charged. Used to look in the drain. The light has multiple brightness options. Has a good feel to it. The only con I would say is that the picture quality of the stored image could be better, but it works for what it is meant for
customer_reviews.author: Manu Mukerji

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: last weekend I was repairing my air conditioner up to my attic, with very narrow space and super hot, this thing helped me a lot! get to see what I need see quicker and clear. with all the efforts, now my AC is back to work. So Happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Not a clear picture.
customer_reviews.text: The head of camera is a little big so it doesn't turn corners. I was hoping for a better picture quality. I thought the mirror attachment would allow me to see around corners. It gets too much glare from light to see around corners. So basically I wish I didn't buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This exceeded my expectations. I bought a Ryobi endoscope which was twice the price and this is way better especially since you can put a mini SD card and take pics or video. Very impressive and a great value
customer_reviews.author: Laser Show

customer_reviews.title: This is what I really needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried two different scopes that hook up to my smartphone with very disappointing results. This one I took out of the box, hit the power button and boom I get a crisp clear picture. Can't wait to read all the instructions to get the other features set up.
customer_reviews.author: BCT

customer_reviews.title: Photos are of unacceptable quality for inspection report submissions to clients.
customer_reviews.text: Screen preview was ok, but upon loading photos onto computer, realized picture quality is not even the already low advertised 1080p. Photos are of unacceptable quality for inspection report submissions to clients.
customer_reviews.author: amchudyk

customer_reviews.title: can't do better for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Comes with attachments for the camera like a magnet, mirror for looking back. Good picture quality. Spot for memory card to record to. Was fully charged when I removed it from the box. I have use it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L.

customer_reviews.title: Look at my new tech gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Well packaged item. Arrived safe and sound. Fully charged out of the box. First used to check out a stubborn drain clog in the kitchen sink pipes. Took a couple of minutes to get the hang of everything, but once I did, inspection was easy and saved us a big plumbing bill! I plan to take a look into our dryer vent next. It’s fun to use and kinda addictive knowing I can peek into places humans would not normally be able to see.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Completely failed in less than a year after only two uses.
customer_reviews.text: Went to use it today for the third time ever, unit turns on and displays a pure blank white screen. Does nothing else, no on-screen UI or anything. Light button changes light on the camera end, but that's it.
customer_reviews.author: shea241

customer_reviews.title: It's cool for a plethora of things. Spying, pervert things, dumb things and mechanic things.
customer_reviews.text: It's good enough to see stuff you can't get into to see. Look into cylinder bores, nooks, crannies, under doors, ears, nostrils, butt holes, whatevers...🤔🤔🤔. Does it work? Yes it does. Is it as good as a snap on unit, yeah kinda. Can't complain for the price, another tool in my arsenal of tools.
customer_reviews.author: Long Mac

customer_reviews.title: High resolution and convenient endoscope
customer_reviews.text: The device features a high resolution camera to enable you to enjoy a great inspection experience with a clear, close range recording of captured video and snapshots for documentation. This device is very convenient, allowing us to view images immediately without having to download anything! Not only is it waterproof, the images are high quality and clear at various environments.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running wires in closed walls and ceilings
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for running cable into closed walls and ceilings. It's bright and the resolution makes it lots easier to see what I need to see. Being able to take a snapshot and save to a micro SD card is super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: jason scott

customer_reviews.title: A useful tool
customer_reviews.text: It is HD, no doubt, it needs to stay focused. It has a light control and after some practice it takes good photos. It is a bargain considering what one can do with it for the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this endoscope camera for house plumbing and car work. It works great! I’ve used it a few times while trying to fix the plumbing inside my home and I can see very clear inside the pipes. It definitely helped me solve the issue. It is a great handy tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: perter

customer_reviews.title: Works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this unit and I must say that I'm blown away with how easy it was to use and how well it worked right out of the box without a glitch. The picture quality is very good. Besides the lens attachments it came packed with a generous 32gb micro SD memory card. The unit has a very good build quality feel to it. So far, I am very impressed with this Industrial Endoscope.
customer_reviews.author: Rich - Sacramento CA

customer_reviews.title: This is noway 1080p HD
customer_reviews.text: It works until you turn on the light and everything washed out white. And there is noway this is 1080p. I can’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: REDFOXXX

customer_reviews.title: Cool tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this endoscope to find a small part fell into the plastic tube inside wall. It works very well. The picture is clear and the battery lasts a long time. The best thing is that it does not need your phone or connect to your computer to see the pictures. The monitor shows everything. Like it!
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box my unit did not work at all, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, looking forward to using it
customer_reviews.text: I've always been meaning to get an inspection camera, last week's prime day was a good time to find one. Unit works well, has long camera feed, allows you to record pictures or video, and has adapters to pick up stuff that maybe fell down a pipe or whatever. Main thing is this unit has a large battery, big quality screen, and a long camera adapter. Other units of similar price don't have as much. I'm happy and look forward to trying it out on the field.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Tousek

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to buy another.
customer_reviews.text: After having this endoscope, I tried it immediately by having it through the sink drain. It worked flawlessly as expected as it went through water inside the p-trap without any trouble. The image was not so clear but it was enough to see some food residuals remaining inside the drain pipe down the bottom of the p-trap. With a built-in screen, I can leave my phone away when working with water and high heat. Therefore, this model fits my bill pretty well!five stars
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Failed after one year
customer_reviews.text: Camera completely failed after one year. I use this endoscope occasionally. Most of the time it sits in a box. Very disappointing. The LED is always too bright as well. Can't turn it down enough to reduce glare.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Blair

customer_reviews.title: Great product minus the screen
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is an excellent product that is easy to use. Only problem is with the image quality. I do not believe the image quality is 1080p, more like 180p. The screen was very blurry. Even upon removing the memory card and viewing it on a computer, it's impossible to see the images. This could be a problem with my particular unit. The images are extremely blurry making the product useless for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great product and amazingly priced.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the price I could not believe that it would come with so many features like the ability to take pictures and store them to a memory card for later review. For what I use it for, plumbing, I am not only able to see what I'm working with, but also most of the time, we break up and blast the obstruction down pipe without ever knowing what it was. With that function, I am able to show the customer, what it exactly the item was.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I got this originally as I was working on on a project that was hard to get to a nut. I now look for things to use it for! We were even pushing it down a gopher hole 😆
customer_reviews.author: JRT

customer_reviews.title: Great tool to find blockages in drainage
customer_reviews.text: I used the endoscope to find blockages in our drainage and it worked great! The video quality is clear and there are several light options on the camera. I used it in wet environments and it worked just fine, so the waterproofing is good. Definitely happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of this but I took a chance on it. I am a welding Inspector and need to look inside of pieces frequently, I am very pleased with this clarity is excellent and I would recommend one of these for anyone like mechanics, electricians, plumbers and the average homeowner. you can take still photos and videos with it also. It is a great quality product and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Cool for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the performance of the tool. Nice, clear picture, and the length of the camera worked great for my need. You never really know how much you need it until you have one.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The light has 3 brightness settings as well as being able to turn it off. You can take a photo as well. It is fairly compact but the screen seems to have good resolution at the same time. For the price this is a great tool to have!!
customer_reviews.author: logan

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible screen viewing angle. This makes it very hard to keep it in place and viewable with the rigid camera cable. Basically you need one hand to hold the screen & that leaves you only one hand to work the camera. Pretty fragile for an “industrial” product. Took a small tumble and the screen broke.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Super easy to use, no setup and built-in screen. The video quality is better than most of the videos I've used. The indicator light is a bright LED that illuminates the target well. There is no real delay or pixelation in the video. The tip is very thin, and the main cable of the oscilloscope remains its shape after forming, and it is also very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Super cool gadget
customer_reviews.text: Super cool gadget! Perfect for use around the house. The wires are long and hard to reach. Good image quality, you can adjust the brightness. However, when you turn up the brightness completely, the iron head will become very hot. The fact that you can record and take photos and upload them to a memory card for viewing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: ROSAMARIA ROSALES

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Endoscope
customer_reviews.text: This endoscope is excellent. The light is with great brightness and no worries for dart places. Also the video quality is good enough to see clearly and the instruction will give briefly guide so that it is easy to use. Love this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great, except....
customer_reviews.text: I especially like that it runs off of an 18650 battery, since I have plenty of them charged and on hand at all times. Camera is decent and focus at small distances could be better, but is still quite useful. The screen is nice, too. It's all adequate, and there is no single important deficit with the Rotek, but the LED lighting at the head of the 5M camera cable broke somewhere inside, and I can't find any warranty information (assuming there is a warranty).
customer_reviews.author: RK Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Handy camera, easy to use great picture
customer_reviews.text: Great handy camera, screen is clear, led lights are bright and controls are easy to use. Handy tool to look inside any small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Mr McCloud

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful tool for a handyman. High video quality, long cable and waterproof. Also long battery life. A must-have tool for inspection of hard-to-reach area.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: worth buy
customer_reviews.text: With screen, this tools makes everything easy. I also like the strong ness of the camera and the accessories came with it. Better angle for inspecting and view point. I guess the selling point is the led light in the camera makes dark area so bright to see. I should have bought this long time ago and this tool does the job. So far is great!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Works better than described. Works right out of the box no instructions needed. I was easily able to see within my walls with it and search for mold. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Vill

customer_reviews.title: Not another accident
customer_reviews.text: A nice diverse tool. Extra long scope. The machine is a nice size for your hands and a large viewing screen. I do a lot of photo Inspections and the quality of the photos are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture and useful tool!
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be a very useful tool when working in tight places. My son has used it while working on his car motor and says it’s extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Useful for plumbing, carpentry, or just plain peering into mysterious spaces in your house.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right the first time. Aided me in figuring out a couple plumbing problems, then I used it several times peering under and behind large objects looking for lost items. I guarantee you'll use it more than you think. The only issue I've had is that it is sometimes hard to figure out which was is "up" in the video. But that's minor.
customer_reviews.author: JR Hume

customer_reviews.title: 24 year pro tech
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the best devices I've purchased, Def a must have inspection tool for pro mechanics like me and home mechanics
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What I liked about this product, was how easy it was to use and how versatile. I wish I had something like this 20 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Philippe

customer_reviews.title: replaced
customer_reviews.text: , the light quit working , i sent the unit back for a refund,
customer_reviews.author: jim c.

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality camera. Used it in cylinder for engines and to find blocks drain lines. The only thing I wish I came with was a memory card but that’s not a issue. You just need to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: michael hoke

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: For the price it was quite a good camera. It worked in my sink plumbing to spot a bad connection and in the wall to determine where to cut for a valve. Clear picture.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Can't say much had to return because my dad didn't want it. As always amazon was great
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: THE CABLE WITH CAMERA IS NOT DETACHABLE
customer_reviews.text: I DISAGREE WITH THE PRODUCT, THE CABLE OF THE CAMERA IS NOT DETACHABLE, IN SOME IMAGES AND SPECIFICALLY IN THE VIDEO IT IS SHOWN THAT IT IS DETACHABLE, BUT IT IS NOT ... IT IS UNPLEASANT TO RECEIVE A PRODUCT DIFFERENT THAN THE ONE ADVERTISED.
customer_reviews.author: NDT

customer_reviews.title: Watch  video  on  utube
customer_reviews.text: Direction booklet , found to be confusing. Watch a video on Utube several times and a lot of questions were answered.
customer_reviews.author: Al    Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tool was a lifesaver when we were building our house. The builder (sheetrockers) covered up several of our electrical outlets and we had to find them under the floors, and in walls that had blown in insulation. This made the task fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: aboreemore

customer_reviews.title: Hand held scope
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up plenty of cable length
customer_reviews.author: moo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what we needed. We checked behind a couple of walls and in some AC vents for visible mold. Captured what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: TB33

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the picture is not the best but considering it’s an industrial tool it’s great. It’s simple and easy to use. I also use this at home and cars. Great buy...
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully I purchased this item and found the elbow. Now comes the hard part, how the heck can I get it back to the surface? This endoscope has a magnetic attachment that has just enough power to drag the piece over so I could reach in and grab it. Success!!
customer_reviews.author: mihael

customer_reviews.title: The picture is very clear
customer_reviews.text: I heard scratches on the wall and wanted to see if he had termites. I thought about the product, the screen was bigger than I thought, and the image quality left a deep impression on me. I also checked the drain pipe that drained slowly and found a problem. very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Andy DiGenova

customer_reviews.title: Just one small issue
customer_reviews.text: Great inspection camera. Good quality pics and display feels well built. Only issue is there is a loose wire in the cable near where it plugs into display, you have to hold it a certain way in order for the light to work. Would be nice to find a replacement cable.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Ferre

customer_reviews.title: Not flexible
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality and you are able to flip image, not very flexible and hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera works as described. The software is intuitive and connects easily with your mobile phone. Used it to look down our sink drain. I expect to use this camera for many more projects in the future that have hard to see aspects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear screen
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to set up. Crystal clear screen. Great picture quality. I also like that it comes with a long cable.
customer_reviews.author: Guo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome endoscope
customer_reviews.text: What a great endoscope for the buck. I use it every day for my trade doing hvac professional tune ups looking for cracked heat exchanger or plugged A/C coils. Also comes with some attachments that actually came in handy a time or two. Great product keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bossingham

customer_reviews.title: Great Endoscope
customer_reviews.text: The endoscope works great with its different compatible heads. Not only that, it also has lights the help it move though areas. The camera works extremely clear during my inspection of electrical lights. The battery lasts hours and it is able to save videos for further inspection. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve savage

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clogged drains
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for what we needed. The kitchen drain was clogged and it allowed us to see where the clog was!
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: The camera is really convenient,
customer_reviews.text: The camera is really convenient. It is so small and has lights to observe the internal operation of the equipment, assist in adding lubricating oil, and check wear. Very good things to use, easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: mary e. perez

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i use this to check some mechanics,it really works good!
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: has the required length.
customer_reviews.text: This endoscope is exactly what I need for my plumbing work. It has been assembled, the image is high definition and has the required length.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Marconi

customer_reviews.title: very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very helpful. I used it when cleaning the sewer and installing electricity. The price is high a little bit, but I think the quality is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: it has a big screen, very clear pictures and can be used to check many hidden places at home, like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jiliang Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Picture can be grainy and difficult to know which direction the camera is turned but what can you expect for the price?
customer_reviews.author: Valarie Bodeau

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just connect to the monitor. My old one has to connect to computer.It saved a lot of time for me. The pictures are clear inside the sewer, the line is long enough for us to use, and it also has many languages to select. Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: In pictures the product looks good but when you receive the item it’s very bad quality and the camera wasn’t clear and it kept getting disconnected so product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Arwa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and an Even Better Price
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping (thanks to Prime), a bright LED at the end, and pretty good quality screen. Came charged and was ready to go to work.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture and lighting however the battery does not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: TheNannaGroup

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this LCD handheld digital endoscope and it has been working very well for me. It provides the best quality of light and I was easily able to see the debris in my drain line. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Saychaleune

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use and can be used many times during maintenance
customer_reviews.author: Ying weng

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this new tool is that it is easy to use and works well.
customer_reviews.author: William N.

product_meta.title: Industrial Endoscope,ROTEK 5M 1080P HD 4.3inch LCD Screen 2600mAh Rechargeable Battery Borescope, IP67 Waterproof Inspection Camera with 6 LED Lights Digital Video Recording Handheld Endoscope(16.4ft)
feature_bullets: 4.3inch QVGA Color LCD Screen & Solid Glass Screen:The inspection is equipped with 4.3inch QVGA color LCD screen,it does not require a bluetooth or WiFi connection,no signal instability and software crashes.It is made of solid glass,featuring protection from scratches,scrapes.

1080P HD Camera & 32GB SD Card:The endoscope camera features 1080P hd camera,supporting 180°C rotation on the camera body,providing 2 megapixels photos and 1080P video,helping you taking hd video.We provide 32GB SD card,all the photo and video will be stored in memory card,you could watch the photos and videos anytime.

16.4ft Cable & 0.3inch Diameter Camera & Widely Using:16.4 inch long semi-ridged cable which can bend and hold.0.3 inch mini camera probe make it easily access a wide variety of confined place.Our scope camera is the perfect borescope inspection camera for mechanical inspection, pipe repair and sewer/ drain inspection.

6 LED Lights & 3 Light Modes:Compare with other snake camera can't adjust the brightness of the light,our endoscope inspection camera has 8 lights,3 adjustable brightness for you to choose,providing you a clear picture even in dark or low-light condition.

2600 mAh Built-in Battery & IP67 Waterproof:The drain camera features 8mm diameter IP67 waterproof snake camera,built-in 2600mAh rechargeable battery,working up to 3-4 hour when it is fully charged.We provide 12 month warranty,if you have problem about the endoscope hd camera ,we will try our best to solve the problem for you.

specifications.Manufacturer: Shen Zhen Rui Sheng Ke Ji You Xian Gong Si
